about.title: About Yemenis In Exile
about.description: Yemenis In Exile is a podcast sharing stories of Yemenis around the world. We aim to amplify the voices and experiences of Yemenis who have been displaced or affected by conflict, shedding light on their journeys, challenges, and resilience. This project is a collaborative effort, part of the Digital Conflict program.
